channel.title: How close?
channel.description: Basically I want to know weither or not someones tried to completely recreated the real RS with similar drops and spawns. Has it been done? Whos done it? How damn hard would it be to do?

item.title: How close?
item.dc:creator: @planplan planplan
item.description:
@planplan wrote:

jesterab:

Basically I want to know weither or not someones tried to completely recreated the real RS with similar drops and spawns. Has it been done? Whos done it? How damn hard would it be to do?

it’s kinda easy if you know how to change items bonus/and switch combats,but for like skill cape,defeders,etc.that would take months,and i wouldent possibley say it wouldent take 2 years lol maybe a month or so,for most correction.

Read full topic

item.title: How close?
item.dc:creator: @jesterab jesterab
item.description:
@jesterab wrote:

naw I mean, I just want a pvp server with a similar exp and gold flux as runescape. Not nearly as specific as such. Just the same exp and gold you would get from rs. XD

jesterab:

Basically I want to know weither or not someones tried to completely recreated the real RS with similar drops and spawns. Has it been done? Whos done it? How damn hard would it be to do?

It’s possible but no one has created a similar RuneScape you’ll have to code your server for like 2 years maybe 1 to make a RuneScape.
